channel.title: Item on object issue Help Please!

item.title: Item on object issue Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Simba96 Simba96
item.description:
@Simba96 wrote:

ok so i finnaly got my item on object working
i use a charm “gold , green , blue , crimson” on a obelisk it give you xp however the order i have in my useitem.java is gold , green , blue , crimson if i have 10 of each in my inventory i use gold on charm it work but if i use a green whilst i have a gold in my inventory it uses 1 of each instead of just the green heres my code

case 6487:
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(12158, 1)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(12158, 1);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((750), 22);
}
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(12159, 1)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(12159, 1);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((1250), 22);
}
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(12163, 1)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(12163, 1);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((2000), 22);
}
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(12160, 1)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(12160, 1);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((2500), 22);
}
break;

thanks in advance

Read full topic
